headline: Dow Jones Futures: Trump Threatens 100% Canada Tariff; Tesla, Microsoft, Meta, Apple Lead Earnings Wave
summary: President Donald Trump threatened a 100% tariff on Canada if it makes a trade deal with China, a week after endorsing the idea. Tesla, Microsoft, Meta and Apple lead an earnings wave.

raw.headline: Dow Jones Futures: Trump Threatens 100% Canada Tariff; Tesla, Microsoft, Meta, Apple Lead Earnings Wave

headline: Assessing Whether Lam Research (LRCX) Still Offers Value After Strong Recent Gains
summary: Lam Research stock performance snapshot Lam Research (LRCX) has seen mixed short term moves, with a 1 day return of about a 1.3% decline and a 7 day return of roughly a 2.3% decline, while longer horizons look very different. See our latest analysis for Lam Research. Despite the recent 1 day and 7 day share price pullback, Lam Research’s latest share price of $217.94 sits against a strong backdrop, with a 1 month share price return of 22.90% and a very large 1 year total shareholder return...
